page.title: 09Local Games (cont)
page.content:
into the remaining numbers.If they miss the square the next person gets a try.The first person to get to ten without missing is the winner.
Marbles Any number of people can play.Draw a circle on a flat surface.Each player puts in the same number of marbles from his own store.the first person flicks a marble into the circle.If any marbles are knocked out of the circle they belong to the player who fiicked the marble.The game goes on, each player having a turn to play until all the marbles from the circle are won.The player with the most marbles at the end of the game is the winner.
